title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 207.46 - Small estate proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 207.46 - Small estate proceedings

State Regulations

In all proceedings for the settlement of small
estates without court administration (SCPA article 13), if additional
certificates of voluntary administration are requested, other than updated or
replacement certificates for the same asset or assets as the original
certificate, such request shall be accompanied by an affidavit from either the
voluntary administrator or the attorney of record setting forth the reasons
additional certificates are required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
207.46

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
